participant_1.background:
I spend too much time shopping.
I drive a ford taurus.
I love katy perry.
I work in retail.

participant_2.background:
I also enjoy reading novels by female authors and exploring new areas.
I often spend my free time engaging in activism work with friends and family.
I work as a legal assistant in a law firm that basically only handles real estate work.
I enjoy this type of activist work , as my job is not very personally fulfilling.
I enjoying keeping up with the news and learning about political issues.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1.
Hello, nice to meet you. What's your name?
Thank you. My name is participant_1. What do you do for a living?
I'm a legal assistant in a law firm.
Oh, that sounds interesting. What kind of law firm?
We mainly handle real estate work.
That's cool. Do you like your job?
It's ok. It's not very personally fulfilling, but it pays the bills.
Yeah, I know what you mean. I work in retail, and it's not the most exciting job in the world, but it's a good job for now.
I hear you. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to read. I read a lot of novels by female authors.
That's great. I love to read too. I've been reading a lot about political issues lately.
Oh, that's interesting. I'm not really into politics, but I do like to keep up with the news.
Yeah, I think it's important to be informed.
I agree. So, what are some of your favorite books?
I have a lot of favorite books, but one of my favorites is "The Handmaid's Tale" by Margaret Atwood.
Oh, I've heard of that book. I've been meaning to read it.
You should! It's a great book.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. So, what are some of your favorite things to do for fun?
I love to go shopping. I'm always on the lookout for new clothes and accessories.
That's cool. I like to go shopping too, but I'm not as into clothes as you are. I'm more into shoes and jewelry.
I love shoes and jewelry too! We should go shopping together sometime.
That would be fun!
Great. I'll let you know when I'm free.
